Friends FeedAggregated Friends' Updates

A versatile tool that aggregates updates from your friends' blogs, featuring AI-generated article summaries and effortless tracking of friends' feeds.

Go to Docs
API Reference
🤖

AI Summary Generation

Supports Gemini, SiliconFlow, and other models to automatically generate article summaries

📖

Content Hash Caching

Prevents duplicate summary generation, reducing API calls and costs

📌

Version Detection

Built-in version checking to receive timely update notifications

👭

Friends' Feed Aggregation

Real-time retrieval of the latest posts and updates from friends' sites

📊

Activity Tracking

Intuitive insights into the activity status of each friend's website

📦

Flexible Deployment

Comprehensive documentation for quick deployment in various environments
